title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Council Grove
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     Kansas Exhibits     Council Grove                  Council Grove         Council Grove, Last Chance Store   Ten exhibits were originally designed for Council Grove in the late 1990s. Over time, the exhibits lost their luster and were redesigned and replaced in 2013. Click here to view all ten exhibits (2.8 MB, pdf, large file).
